_sText:
**************

GG_SIMPSONS_X

**************


The following maps were used by me to build this map:

URL: http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/26476
MAP: gg_simpsons_street
AUTHOR: mck-76 / koma kolonne
NOTES: This map is the main influence I used. It is the basis for gg_simpsons_x. Without this map, gg_simpsons_x would not exist. Plain and simple.


http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/10432
MAP: de_simpsons_css_v2
AUTHOR: ChoGGi
NOTES: This map by ChoGGi is where I got my Simpsons textures from. I also used this map for the store designs, UFO, the bench design, etc.


http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/23346
MAP: aim_crazyjump_simpsons_fixed
AUTHOR: cepo
NOTES: From this map I sourced the bus and trailer designs as well as the treehouse.


http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/10122
MAP: awp_simpsons_css
AUTHOR: ChoGGi
NOTES: This map provided me with the basis for the Krusty Burger and Moe's Tavern stores.


Although those maps by those authors were referenced to make gg_simpsons_x, I made a lot of custom textures on my own, edited texture faces, and put in a lot of personal time, work and effort to complete the build. Nonetheless, however, this map by me wouldn't have been possible without these other authors' hard work, too.

This map is similar to other Simpsons maps, as well as my other map, gg_simpsons_x.

I made this map for several reasons:

1 -- Some people think gg_simpsons_x is too big.
2 -- I enjoy making Simpsons maps and wish I had more time to make them!
3 -- It's fun trying out new layouts for Simpsons-themed maps.


Personally, I like my other gg_simpsons_x map better. It has more features, but that's largely because it's much bigger. At any rate, this map is very fun, too, and much more suited for smaller matches.

This map supports 40 players max.

The T and CT side each have 1 spawn on top of the UFO. This should add some fun!

*** ALSO ***

* VARIED SPAWNPOINTS !!

Each team has 3 areas to spawn in on their side. It's now impossible to know exactly where your enemies will come from each round. 4 areas including the UFO spawn!

In the playtests with this new map I've had on my server, the map's been an absolute blast. VERY FAST playing map, too! No boring rounds on this map at all!


Enjoy!
